entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 35. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
